thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Continental Resources Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.41

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Continental Resources Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.41
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Continental Resources Inc:
* CONTINENTAL RESOURCES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.41 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.25 * QTRLY PRODUCTION OF 286,985 BOE PER DAY (59% OIL) AVERAGE, UP 37% OVER Q4 2016
* Q1 2018 PRODUCTION IS ESTIMATED TO BE BETWEEN 285,000 AND 290,000 BOE PER DAY
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $1,047.2 MILLION VERSUS $549.7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
